io.iron.ironmq

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.iron.ironmq.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Message class represents a message retrieved from an IronMQ queue.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        delay - The new delay.

      • getExpiresIn

        public long getExpiresIn()
        Returns the number of seconds in which the Message will be removed from the queue. If the server default of 7 days will be used, 0 is returned.

      • setExpiresIn

        public void setExpiresIn(long expiresIn)
        Sets the number of seconds in which the Message will be removed from the queue.
        Parameters:
        expiresIn - The new expiration offset in seconds. A value less than or equal to 0 will cause the server default of 7 days to be used.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the Message.
